description.english: Repair your ship and prepare to sail the seas.
description.german: Repariere dein Schiff und bereite dich darauf vor, über die Meere zu segeln.
description.french: Réparer votre navire et préparer les voiles pour prendre la mer.
description.italian: Ripara la tua nave e preparati a salpare.
description.spanish: Repara tu barco y prepárate para surcar los mares.
description.schinese: 修理你的船只，为航海做好准备。
description.russian: Почините корабль и подготовьтесь к отплытию.
description.portuguese: Conserte seu navio e se prepare para velejar.
description.polish: Napraw swój statek i przygotuj go do żeglugi.
description.brazilian: Conserte seu navio e se prepare para velejar.

description.english: Establish a link with Eothas to track his movements.
description.german: Stelle eine Verbindung zu Eothas her, damit du seine Bewegungen nachverfolgen kannst.
description.french: Établir un lien avec Éothas pour suivre ses déplacements.
description.italian: Stabilisci un legame con Eothas per rintracciare i suoi movimenti.
description.koreana: 에오타스와 정신을 연결하여 그의 행적을 따라가십시오.
description.spanish: Instaura un vínculo con Eothas para seguir sus movimientos.
description.schinese: 与俄撒斯连接以追踪他的行动。
description.russian: Свяжите себя с Эотасом, чтобы следить за его перемещениями.
description.portuguese: Estabeleça um elo com Eothas para monitorar os movimentos dele.
description.polish: Stwórz więź z Eothasem, by śledzić jego ruchy.
description.brazilian: Estabeleça um elo com Eothas para monitorar os movimentos dele.

description.english: Confront Eothas in Magran's Teeth.
description.german: Konfrontiere Eothas in Magrans Zähnen.
description.french: Faire face à Éothas aux Dents de Magran.
description.italian: Confrontati con Eothas a Denti di Magran
description.spanish: Enfréntate a Eothas en Dientes de Magran.
description.schinese: 在玛珈岚之牙直面俄撒斯
description.russian: Встретиться с Эотасом в Зубах Магран
description.portuguese: Confronte Eothas na Presa de Magran.
description.polish: Staw czoła Eothasowi w Zębach Magrany.
description.brazilian: Confronte Eothas na Presa de Magran.

description.english: Confront Eothas in Ukaizo.
description.german: Stelle Eothas ins Ukaizo zur Rede.
description.french: Faire face à Éothas à Ukaizo.
description.italian: Confrontati con Eothas a Ukaizo.
description.spanish: Enfréntate a Eothas en Ukaizo.
description.schinese: 在乌凯佐直面俄撒斯
description.portuguese: Entre em Ukaizo e resolva a crise com Eothas.
description.brazilian: Entre em Ukaizo e resolva a crise com Eothas.

description.english: Complete the Huana faction questline.
description.german: Schließe die Questreihe der Huana-Fraktion ab.
description.french: Terminer les quêtes de faction des Huanas.
description.italian: Completa la missione della fazione degli Huana.
description.spanish: Completa la cadena de misiones de la facción de los huana.
description.schinese: 完成胡亚纳势力任务线。
description.portuguese: Complete a série de missões da facção Huana.
description.brazilian: Complete a série de missões da facção Huana.

displayName.french: De l'or, de la cupidité et des tripes

description.german: Segle zu allen Haupthäfen im Todesfeuer.

description.english: Recruited all Companions.
description.german: Werbe alle Gefährten an.
description.french: Tous les compagnons recrutés.
description.italian: Reclutati tutti i compagni.

description.schinese: 招募所有同伴

description.brazilian: Recrutou todos os sete companheiros.

description.brazilian: Recrute todos os quatro aliados.

description.english: Create an adventurer at an Adventurer's Hall.

description.french: Créer un aventurier à la Salle de l'aventurier.
description.italian: Crea un personaggio nel Salone degli avventurieri.
description.spanish: Crea un aventurero en un Salón del Aventurero.
description.schinese: 在冒险者大厅创建一名冒险者。

description.polish: Stwórz poszukiwacza przygód w Gmachu Poszukiwaczy Przygód.
description.brazilian: Crie um aventureiro no Salão do Aventureiro.

description.english: Maximize positive relationship with a Companion.
description.german: Verschaffe dir die maximale positive Reputation mit einem Gefährten.
description.french: Gagner le maximum de réputation positive auprès d'un compagnon.
description.italian: Massimizza la relazione positiva con un compagno.
description.koreana: 동료 한 명과 긍정적인 관계를 최대치까지 올리십시오.
description.spanish: Obtén la máxima relación positiva con un compañero.
description.schinese: 与一名同伴的正面关系达到最高。
description.russian: Максимально улучшите отношения с одним из спутников.
description.portuguese: Maximize uma relação positiva com um Companheiro.
description.polish: Osiągnij maksymalnie pozytywną relację z towarzyszem.
description.brazilian: Maximize uma relação positiva com um Companheiro.

description.english: Maximize negative relationship with a Companion.

description.spanish: Obtén la máxima relación negativa con un compañero.
description.schinese: 与一名同伴的负面关系达到最高。
description.russian: Максимально испортите отношения с одним из спутников.
description.portuguese: Maximize uma reputação negativa com um Companheiro.
description.polish: Osiągnij maksymalnie negatywną relację z towarzyszem.
description.brazilian: Maximize uma reputação negativa com um Companheiro.

description.english: Name your first Uncharted Island.
description.german: Gib deiner ersten nicht kartierten Insel einen Namen.
description.french: Nommer votre première Île inexplorée.
description.italian: Nomina la tua prima isola sperduta.
description.spanish: Ponle nombre a tu primera isla inexplorada.
description.schinese: 命名你的第一座未标小岛。
description.portuguese: Nomeie sua primeira Ilha Inexplorada.
description.polish: Nazwij swoją pierwszą wyspę, której nie ma na mapach.
description.brazilian: Nomeie sua primeira Ilha Inexplorada.

description.english: Name all of the Uncharted Islands.
description.german: Gib allen nicht kartierten Inseln einen Namen.
description.french: Nommer toutes les Îles inexplorées.
description.italian: Nomina tutte le isole sperdute.
description.spanish: Ponle nombre a todas las islas inexploradas.
description.schinese: 为所有未标小岛命名。
description.portuguese: Nomeie todas as Ilhas Inexploradas.
description.brazilian: Nomeie todas as Ilhas Inexploradas.

description.english: Attach your first ship upgrade.
description.german: Bringe deine erste Schiffsverbesserung an.
description.french: Attacher la première amélioration de votre navire.
description.italian: Monta la prima miglioria della nave.
description.spanish: Coloca tu primera mejora del barco.
description.schinese: 安装你的第一项舰船升级。
description.portuguese: Construa sua primeira melhoria de navio.
description.brazilian: Construa sua primeira melhoria de navio.

description.english: Attach each type of upgrade on a single ship.
description.german: Bringe jede der unterschiedlichen Verbesserungen an einem einzigen Schiff an.
description.french: Attacher chaque type d'amélioration sur un seul navire.
description.italian: Monta ogni tipo di miglioria sulla stessa nave.
description.koreana: 단일 선박에 대해 모든 유형의 업그레이드를 진행하십시오.
description.spanish: Coloca todos los tipos de mejora en un solo barco.
description.schinese: 在一艘船上安装所有类型的升级。
description.russian: Установите на один корабль улучшения всех типов.
description.portuguese: Construa todos os tipos de melhorias em um único navio.
description.polish: Zamontuj każdy rodzaj ulepszenia na jednym statku.
description.brazilian: Construa todos os tipos de melhorias em um único navio.

displayName.english: A Fleet to Call My Own
displayName.german: Eine Flotte, um sie mein eigen zu nennen
displayName.spanish: Una flota que puedo calificar como propia
displayName.portuguese: Uma Frota pra Chamar de Minha
displayName.brazilian: Uma Frota pra Chamar de Minha

description.english: Acquire each type of ship in the game.
description.german: Erwerbe im Rahmen des Spiels ein Schiff jeder Art.
description.french: Acquérir chaque type de navire du jeu.
description.italian: Ottieni ciascun tipo di nave del gioco.
description.spanish: Adquiere todos los tipos de barco en la partida.
description.schinese: 获取游戏中的每一种舰船。
description.portuguese: Adquira todo tipo de navio no jogo.
description.polish: Zdobądź każdy dostępny w grze rodzaj statku.
description.brazilian: Adquira todo tipo de navio no jogo.

description.english: Assign a crew member to all slots on a single ship.
description.german: Weise jedem Platz auf einem einzigen Schiff ein Mannschaftsmitglied zu.
description.french: Affecter un membre de l'équipage à chaque emplacement d'un même navire.
description.italian: Assegna un membro della ciurma a tutti gli slot di una nave.
description.koreana: 단일 선박 내의 모든 공간에 선원을 배치하십시오.
description.spanish: Asigna todos los puestos a un miembro en un solo barco.
description.schinese: 为一艘船上的所有位置分配船员。
description.russian: Назначьте одного из членов команды на все посты на одном корабле.
description.portuguese: Encarregue um membro da tripulação de cada um dos espaços em um único navio.
description.polish: Przydziel osobę do wszystkich miejsc dla załogi na jednym statku.
description.brazilian: Encarregue um membro da tripulação de cada um dos espaços em um único navio.

description.english: Acquired First Captain Rank.
description.german: Erwerbe deinen ersten Kapitänsrang.

description.english: Acquired Master Captain Rank.

description.brazilian: Adquiriu o nível de Mestre Capitão.

description.english: Finish 15 Bounties.
description.german: 15 Kopfgelder erledigen.
description.french: Accomplir 15 primes.
description.italian: Completa 15 taglie.
description.spanish: Encuentra 15 recompensas.
description.schinese: 完成15次赏金任务。

description.brazilian: Termine 15 Caças de Recompensa.

description.english: Unlock all powers of a Soulbound item.
description.german: Schalte alle Kräfte eines seelengebundenen Gegenstands frei.
description.french: Déverrouiller tous les pouvoirs d'un objet lié à l'âme.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i poteri di un oggetto con Legame dell'anima.
description.koreana: 하나의 영혼 결합 물품이 지닌 힘을 전부 개방하십시오.

description.portuguese: Desbloqueie todos os poderes de um item Vinculado.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os poderes de um item Vinculado.

description.english: Create five or more different potions.
description.german: Braue fünf Zaubertränke.
description.french: Créer au moins cinq potions différentes.
description.italian: Crea cinque o più diverse pozioni
description.koreana: 각기 다른 종류의 물약을 5개 이상 제작하십시오.

description.schinese: 制造五瓶不同的药水。

description.polish: Stwórz pięć lub więcej różnych mikstur.
description.brazilian: Produza cinco ou mais poções diferentes.

description.german: Erschaffe drei Schriftrollen mit Zaubersprüchen.
description.french: Créer au moins trois parchemins de sort.

description.polish: Stwórz trzy lub więcej różnych zwojów z czarami.
description.brazilian: Crie três ou mais pergaminhos de feitiço diferentes.

description.brazilian: Encante cinco itens.

description.brazilian: Lide com o dilema de dois Dragões

description.english: Reach level twenty with the player character.
description.german: Erreiche mit deinem Spielercharakter Stufe zwanzig.

description.brazilian: Alcance o nível vinte com o personagem.

description.english: Survive an attack from a mutinous crew.
description.german: Überlebe einen Angriff von einer meuternden Mannschaft.
description.french: Survivre à une attaque d'équipage mutin.
description.italian: Sopravvivi a un attacco di una ciurma ammutinata.

description.brazilian: Sobreviva a um ataque de uma tripulação amotinada.

description.german: Besiege den Vorboten

description.brazilian: Derrote o Mensageiro.

description.english: Defeat Neriscyrlas.
description.german: Besiege Neriscyrlas.

description.italian: Sconfiggi Neriscyrlas.
description.spanish: Derrota a Neriscyrlas.
description.schinese: 击败奈瑞思赛拉丝。
description.portuguese: Derrote Neriscyrlas.
description.brazilian: Derrote Neriscyrlas.

description.english: Escape the White Void.
description.german: Entkomme dem Weißes Nichts.
description.french: Fuyez le Néant blanc.
description.italian: Scappa dal Nulla bianco.
description.spanish: Escapa del Vacío Blanco.
description.schinese: 逃离白色虚空。
description.portuguese: Escape do Vazio Branco.
description.brazilian: Escape do Vazio Branco.

description.english: Decide the fate of Inquisitor Naxiva, St. Waidwen, and King Wingauro o Watūri I.
description.german: Entscheide über das Schicksal von Inquisitorin Naxiva, dem Heiligen Waidwen und König Wingauro o Watūri I.
description.french: Décidez du destin de l'inquisitrice Naxiva, de Saint Waiden et du roi Wingauro o Watūri Premier.
description.italian: Decidi del destino dell'Inquisitrice Naxiva, di San Waidwen e del Re Wingauro o Watūri I.
description.koreana: 심문관 낙시바, 성 와이드웬, 국왕 윈가우로 오 와투리 1세의 운명을 결정하십시오.
description.spanish: Decide el destino de la inquisidora Naxiva, de san Waidwen y del rey Wingauro o Watūri I.
description.schinese: 决定审判者纳西瓦、圣维德温和韵咖若奥瓦图里国王一世的命运。
description.russian: Определить судьбу инквизитора Насивы, святого Вайдвена и короля Уингауро о Уатури I.
description.portuguese: Decida o destino da Inquisidora Naxiva, Sto. Waidwen, e do Rei Wingauro o Waturi I.
description.polish: Zdecyduj o losach inkwizytor Naxivy, św. Waidwena i króla Wingaura o Watūriego I.
description.brazilian: Decida o destino da Inquisidora Naxiva, Sto. Waidwen, e do Rei Wingauro o Waturi I.

displayName.spanish: En busca de una muerte segura

description.english: Enter the Beyond.
description.german: Tritt in das Jenseits ein.
description.french: Entrez dans l'Au-delà.
description.italian: Entra nell'Aldilà.
description.spanish: Entra en el más allá.
description.schinese: 进入灵界。
description.brazilian: Entre no Além.

description.english: Earn the title of contender in the Crucible.
description.german: Verdiene dir den Titel des Herausforderers im Schmelztiegel.
description.french: Obtenir le titre de prétendant dans le Creuset.
description.italian: Vinci il titolo di contendente nel Crogiolo.
description.spanish: Consigue el título de contendiente en el Crisol.
description.schinese: 在竞技场中赢得角斗者头衔。
description.brazilian: Consiga o título de competidor no Crisol.

displayName.schinese: 卡兹瓦里的档案保管员

description.english: Collect all of the Artifacts of the Crucible.
description.german: Sammle alle Artefakte des Schmelztiegels.
description.french: Récupérer tous les artefacts du Creuset.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i Manufatti del Crogiolo.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los artefactos del Crisol.
description.schinese: 收集所有的竞技场工艺品。
description.brazilian: Colete todos os Artefatos do Crisol.

description.english: Confront the porokoa.
description.german: Stelle dich dem Porokoa.
description.french: Affronter le porokoa.
description.italian: Affronta il porokoa.
description.spanish: Enfréntate al porokoa.
description.schinese: 与波罗科亚对峙。
description.brazilian: Confronte os porokoas.

description.english: Repair the flow of souls to the Beyond.
description.german: Stelle den Fluss der Seelen ins Jenseits wieder her.
description.french: Réparer le flux des âmes vers l'Au-delà.
description.italian: Ristabilisci il flusso di anime nell'Aldilà.
description.spanish: Repara el flujo de almas hacia el más allá.
description.schinese: 修复通往灵界的灵魂之流。
description.russian: Восстановите поток душ в потусторонний мир.
description.brazilian: Conserte o fluxo de almas para o Além.
description.koreana: 경계 세계로 가는 영혼의 흐름을 수리하십시오.

displayName.spanish: Da la cara ante las caras

description.english: Become the chosen of the Seeker, Slayer, or Survivor.
description.german: Werde zum Auserwählten des Suchers, Schlächters oder Überlebenden erkoren.
description.french: Devenir l'élu du Pisteur, du Tueur ou du Survivant.
description.italian: Diventa il prescelto del Cercatore, dello Sterminatore o del Superstite.
description.spanish: Conviértete en el elegido del Buscador, del Masacrador o del Superviviente.
description.schinese: 成为探寻者、杀戮者或幸存者的获选者。
description.russian: Станьте избранным Выслеживающего, Убивающего или Выживающего.
description.polish: Dołącz do wybrańców Odkrywczyni, Oprawcy lub Ocalałego.
description.brazilian: Torne-se o escolhido do Perseguidor, do Abatedor ou do Sobrevivente.
description.koreana: 탐구자, 학살자, 생존자 중 한 세력의 선택받은 자가 되십시오.

description.english: Become crowned the Champion of the Hunt.
description.german: Werde zum Meister der Jagd gekrönt.
description.french: Être couronné Champion de la chasse.
description.italian: Fatti incoronare Campione della Caccia.
description.spanish: Te has coronado como campeón de la cacería.
description.schinese: 成为狩猎冠军。
description.brazilian: Seja coroado o Campeão da Caçada.

description.english: Complete the Archives wing of the Halls Obscured.
description.german: Schließe den Archivflügel in den Verschleierten Hallen ab.
description.french: Terminer l'aile des Archives dans les Chambres obscurcies.
description.italian: Completa l'ala degli Archivi delle Sale Oscurate.
description.koreana: 가려진 전당의 기록 보관소 모험을 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Completar el ala de los Archivos de los Salones Oscuros.
description.schinese: 完成晦密之厅中的档案库侧厅部分。
description.russian: Обойдите архивное крыло в Сокрытых Залах.
description.polish: Ukończ skrzydło Archiwum w Ukrytych Komnatach.
description.brazilian: Complete a ala dos Arquivos nos Salões Obscurecidos.

description.english: Complete the Collections wing of the Halls Obscured.
description.german: Schließe den Flügel mit der Sammlung in den Verschleierten Hallen ab.
description.french: Terminer l'aile des Collections dans les Chambres obscurcies.
description.italian: Completa l'ala delle Collezioni delle Sale Oscurate.
description.spanish: Completar el ala de las Colecciones de los Salones Oscuros.
description.schinese: 完成晦密之厅中的藏品馆侧厅部分。
description.russian: Обойдите крыло Коллекций в Сокрытых Залах.
description.polish: Ukończ skrzydło Zbiorów w Ukrytych Komnatach.
description.brazilian: Complete a ala das Coleções nos Salões Obscurecidos.

description.english: Confront the Oracle of Wael in the Heart of Mystery.
description.german: Stelle dich im Herzen der Mysterien dem Orakel von Wael.
description.french: Confronter l'Oracle de Wael dans le Cœur du mystère.
description.italian: Affronta l'Oracolo di Wael nel Cuore del mistero.
description.spanish: Enfrentarte al Oráculo de Wael en el Corazón del Misterio.
description.schinese: 在神秘之心中面对沃艾珥的先知。
description.russian: Встретьтесь с оракулом Ваэля в Сердце Тайны.
description.polish: Staw czoła Wyroczni Waela w Sercu Tajemnic.
description.brazilian: Enfrente o Oráculo de Wael no Coração do Mistério.

description.english: Create a pet using the Critter Cleaver.
description.german: Erschaffe mithilfe des Kreaturenspalters ein Haustier.
description.french: Créer un animal de compagnie à l'aide du Hachoir à bestioles.
description.italian: Crea un animale usando la Mannaia per animali.
description.spanish: Crear una mascota con la Cuchilla de criaturas.
description.schinese: 使用斩畜刀制造一只宠物
description.russian: Воспользуйтесь Тесаком Созданий для создания питомца.
description.polish: Stwórz zwierzaka za pomocą kreatora kreatur.
description.brazilian: Crie um mascote usando o Corta Bicho.

description.english: Obtain all of Weyc Heldr's items.
description.german: Beschaffe alle Gegenstände von Weyc Heldr
description.french: Obtenir tous les objets de la weyc Heldr.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli oggetti di Weyc Heldr.
description.spanish: Obtener todos los objetos de Weyc Heldr.
description.schinese: 获得高阶谋士海尔德的全部物品。
description.brazilian: Obtenha todos os itens de Weyc Heldr.

description.english: Open all of the cages in the Collections.
description.german: Öffne alle Käfige in den Sammlungen.
description.french: Ouvrir toutes les cages des Collections.
description.italian: Apri tutte le gabbie nelle Collezioni.
description.spanish: Abrir todas las jaulas de las Colecciones.
description.schinese: 打开藏品馆中所有的牢笼。
description.brazilian: Abra todas as gaiolas nas Coleções.

description.english: Discover the Secrets of Imp Spray.
description.german: Entdecke die Geheimnisse der Imp-Ausdünstungen.
description.french: Découvrir les secrets du pulvérisateur des diablotins.
description.italian: Scopri i segreti dello Zampillo di folletto.
description.spanish: Descubrir los secretos del rocío de diablillo.
description.schinese: 发现妖精液体的秘密。
description.brazilian: Descubra os Segredos do Esguicho de Diabrete.
